com.coasttocoastresearch.apg
Class Grammar

java.lang.Object
  com.coasttocoastresearch.apg.Grammar
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alphanum, AnBn, AnBnCn, AnyString, Comment, DecNum, Expressions, Expressions, GeneratorGrammar, HexNum, Hostname, IniFile, IPv4, LineEnd, Mailbox, QuotedString, UAnBn, UAnBnCn, UEmpty, UExpressions, UExpressions, UHostname, UIniFile, UIPv4, UMailbox, UNonEmpty, WhiteSpace
public abstract class Grammar
extends java.lang.Object

The Grammar class is the interface between the Parser and the Parser Generator. The Parser Generator will generate derivative extensions of this base class. The generated Grammar class will then be used to initialize the Parser. See the UAnBn Grammar class for documentation on the public API of a generated Grammar.

See Also:
"sample generated grammar"

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
